We always visit when we're in Long beach...so many great pizzas and the salads are also good.  The white pizza is unique and the crust is just right chewy and yet crispy and light:)

i was more than delighted, yesterday lunch, bean soup was good, a l.ittle too spicy, however, the appetizer, varied rolls, were attractively presented, with various,three, sauces  service was excellent - also, when oil is necessary, olive oil is it -

Let me say that I enjoy the food at CPK, however, the low rating is for this particular location.  No matter what time of day or what day of the week I've gone here, it always takes forever for the service.  Want to be seated... wait 5 minutes (even if it's empty).  Did you want water?  That'll be another 7 minutes.  Oh, and you probably wanted an actual drink.  That's not coming until after you finish your meal.  Have you ordered your food?  It'll be 15 minutes before your server even remembers you.  Heaven for bid you should need a side of something or a refill.  We've gone a few times for lunch with coworkers, however, even if we leave early, before the lunch crowd, what typically is supposed to be an hour lunch exceeds an hour and a half because it seems the staff just can't quite get it together.  So, ultimately, this place is a real disappointment.  At least everyone is really nice, but nice doesn't make up for memory lapses and slow service.

i'm a sucker... i went here again... ordered by phone, a salad with no hikama and no tomatos and the asparagus/spinach/chicken spaghettini... she said pick it up in 20-25. i gave them 30 mins.  i think they had forgotten to make the pasta because she was talkin to the chefs about it and said 2 mins and "sorry we have a new pasta maker so it's been a little slow"... finally my pasta comes and then she says but look we put no hikama in the salad! ... oh wait... they put tomatos.... so she went in the back and took off the tomatos.  and i walked merrily back to work... i get here split the pasta between my coworker and i and sit down to FINALLY eat... holy crap! i have never tasted anything saltier than that... well perhaps the rim of my margarita glass.  i was sooooooooooo mad. so then i called and they said they'll make me another one and i had to go there AGAIN and pick it up because they dont deliver. nothing against the girl that gave me my food and took my order but i have a crappy experience every time i go here. i need to stop going ... i get annoyed every time

The service I received was phenomenal. Food came out really fast and everything was clean. I have never felt more welcome or comfortable at a restaurant in my life. I had 4 kids under the age of thirteen with me & our server Travis went above and beyond in accommodating each one of my kids and myself. The hostess ( a young man who's name I was not able to catch) also graciously helped with cleaning, and staffing the table when necessary. Both young men delegated effectively & worked really hard. Thank you for the extra help that was not expected of both of you.

I think the changes and upgrades CPK has made to the menu have been great.  Went here 3 times in 7 weeks due to events in DT LB Food is much better and is creative especially for a chain but this review is for Krista who was our server all 3 times!  She did a great job - was fun, engaging brought extra napkins and kept our glasses refilled - let us know one time why it was taking a bit longer one of our visits - she even brought me water specifically to fill my refillable water bottle - clone her or have her train all the new hires!

Awesome place here right across from the Long Beach Convention Center! Convenient place to eat for Convention activities. The pizza obviously is awesome - order it extra crispy. I had the rib eye steak medium rare - very tasty and will give Mortons a run for their money. Overall lots of options to eat and reasonably priced.
Food was great ordered the chicken bacon avocado egg roll. It was delicious and the service was great. My server was great and very attentive thanks Iris!

Normally I enjoy CPK but not much this time. Stopped here for lunch and they only had a few minutes wait. We were seated on the patio. After bringing our initial drinks, we waited about 15 minutes till the waitress took our orders.  Another 35 minutes passed waiting for our food. Sadly, my order was incorrect except for the salad.  We waited another 25 minutes for the corrected order.  Although the waitress was apologetic and comped part of the meal, it was still quite disappointing service.  Hasn't soured me on CPK, just this location.

This is only my second time going to any CPK and I have to say it was a pleasant experience.  SERVICE Our waiter was Scott, pray that you get him if you come here. He was friendly and always made sure that we were okay. He definitely got a good tip from all of us (we were a party of 5). As for the host and hostess they were both friendly, as well. They also validate parking. FOOD & DRINKS For appetizers we just order the Mac n cheese. It was pretty good, but I doubt I'll get it again. I order the Jamaican Jerk Chicken Pizza with a thin crust. It was really good. The only bad thing was that the crust was a little burnt. I still enjoyed it. As for the drinks, I order the Caribbean Sunset Sangria and the non alcoholic Piña Colada. The sangria was really good, especially because I am not a fan of sangria. The colada was delicious.  Overall the service, food and drinks were well above satisfactory. I'll definitely becoming here again when I'm in the area.

Unfortunately, we probably won't be eating here again. Our bill was almost $70 and it didn't seem worth it. My pasta was dry and I ate less than half of it. The service wasn't that great. We never had a problem before, so I'm not sure what happened. They need to work on running things more efficiently.
My new favorite spot before we hit the movies service is excellent food is delicious and hot !

I came in here after visiting the Dr. and not feeling very well. I had a $20 gift card and I wanted to get the most bang for my free bucks. I figured the lunch duo deal and an add on of another item should do the trick.  I was taken back to the To-Go counter where a nice guy was trying to help me. I'll take the blame in making the order harder than it needed to be. In the end he made my order work by using a childs add-on which even came with a small drink! Bonus!  Im super happy with the service and that the counter fellow was able to help me. The food was good, the service was even better!

We were on the patio for the Grand Prix. Fantastic food and service. Travis was exceptional!  He really took great care of us and went above and beyond on a very busy day. Food and drinks were great and met some really nice folks.

Went here with a date and was pleased to find they had delicious VEGAN options!  I had some pasta with a delicious off-menu marinara type of sauce.  I called prior to my visit and spoke with Lily, who is also vegan.  She was very helpful.  My date had a pizza he devoured. Our waitress, Stefanie, was super attentive and the manager was also really sweet when he was doing his rounds and checking in with guests. Isn't it great when you find a restaurant that can please the omnis and vegans alike?  I'll be back.

Another chain restaurant, but let me explain.  We were at an event down the street at the Hyatt Regency and were looking for a quick and non-exorbitant lunch option.  It was close and looked like a good place to try. Besides, we have never eaten at one of these and wanted to give it a try. I can't speak for all the unusual combinations, but the basic margherita pizza was very good.   Not on a par with the best New Haven apizza, but still good.  In fact, we ordered a dinner pizza later in the week, a very similar one with tomatoes and five cheeses, and found it quite good. Both of our meals were take-out. When I picked up the dinner pizza, the place was crowded and quite loud.  Just a point to keep in mind.

So far so good, it's CPK. If you've been to one, you've pretty much been to all. Good service, we got seated right away. It's 9:36 p.m. on a Wednesday and this place is jam packed! Loud music and all. Parking can be a challenge but well worth it.

Service was excellent and the buffalo cauliflower was delicious. My first time trying this item anywhere. I would definitely return for the cauliflower. The pizza was okay, toppings were fresh but it was still just above average, not great at all. But I'm a Chicago deep dish lover so I'm biased.
Service was Great!!. Seated quickly, drinks, ordered and before you know it another friendly guy brings out your food. . Customer Service is to be applauded.

oh god the service was horrendous at this location!! I love CPK and so does my girlfriend, but the service was just moronic!!! the only good service we had was from the hostess taking us to the table! okay so before getting into the bad service, lets talk about the wonderful food i ordered the spicy chipotle chicken pizza, not too spicy, loaded with veggies and meat, delicious crust, cheesy, and came with some cilantro ranch dressing to cool things down girlfriend got the tequila chicken, could've used more chicken but very good sauce to dip the crust in we also both got strawberry lemonades but shit $7 for two lemonades?? okay so now the service; after being seated we were greeted by the waiter no more than 2 minutes after the hostess left us with the menus..and right away he asks if we are ready to order..like dude wtf chill we just sat down and the restaurant is empty so, we ordered drinks and he came back...asking again....clearly seeing our heads still in the menus..if we were ready to order...and again we told him no. he told us he would give us 5 minutes (seriously, you are timing us?) and i kid you not, he comes back after a minute, stands next to the table and starts talking about the weather...dude LEAVE!!! holy crap chill once again, he leaves after asking if we were ready to order...which we were not...and comes back when we just had it and ordered then out of no where in the middle of eating, another random waiter comes by saying he is the one who brings drinks, BUT he is shaky and might drop them..and then he goes into being a new resident to Long Beach asking us what's there to do..well guess what bro we aint local either!! i didn't leave any tip because of these two morons, who turned what was supposed to be a relaxing meal on the patio into a rushed hop scotch nonsense.
Todd our server was the best and good was great!  Love the shishito peppers and great service.
Came here for lunch after the movies service was horrible it seems like it was her 1st day !!! It took 40minutes to get a beer

Ask for HANNAH. Great atmosphere, hip yet quaint, Food- awesome!  The fettuccine and Buttercake are a must try! Manager checked to make sure that guests were satisfied and the staff was courteous and helpful. Awesome Sangria'!!

First time at a CPK and I thought it was great. The servers at the bar were very communicative to the customers and the staff, and though busy rushing around, seemed to have a bit of chemistry among each other that gave off a 'we can at least tolerate working with each other' vibe. The food was excellent and although a little pricey, it was very filling without being overwhelming. So,a very excellent visit. It'll be a pleasure to visit again.
